statements: SELECT * FROM project_financial_data;
SELECT project_name, start_date, total_budget FROM project_financial_data WHERE expenses > 1000;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project_financial_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, expenses FROM project_financial_data ORDER BY expenses DESC;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM project_financial_data WHERE total_budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM project_financial_data WHERE total_budget > 10000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, expenses FROM project_financial_data WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(total_budget) AS average_budget FROM project_financial_data;
SELECT project_name, expenses, CASE WHEN expenses < 5000 THEN 'Low Expense' ELSE 'High Expense' END AS expense_category FROM project_financial_data;
SELECT project_name, total_budget, ROUND(total_budget * 0.2, 2) AS twenty_percent FROM project_financial_data WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY twenty_percent DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT id, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount < 1000;
SELECT project_id, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.id = expenses.project_id WHERE expenses.amount > 1000 ORDER BY expenses.amount DESC
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE description LIKE '%travel%' AND expense_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY expense_date ASC
SELECT p.name AS project_name, e.amount AS expense_amount FROM projects AS p JOIN expenses AS e ON p.id = e.project_id WHERE e.amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY p.name
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, budget_remaining FROM projects JOIN cost_analysis ON projects.project_id = cost_analysis.project_id WHERE budget_remaining < 0;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, expense_amount FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id WHERE expenses.expense_amount > 5000;
SELECT project_name, analysis_date, total_expenses, budget_remaining FROM projects JOIN cost_analysis ON projects.project_id = cost_analysis.project_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects;
SELECT expense_id, expense_date, description, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, total_spent, remaining_budget FROM projects p JOIN cost_analysis ca ON p.project_id = ca.project_id;
SELECT project_name, expense_date, description, amount FROM projects p JOIN expenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id WHERE p.budget > 5000;
SELECT financial_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_type = 'credit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, remaining_budget FROM budgets WHERE remaining_budget > 0 ORDER BY remaining_budget DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT project_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_expenses > 1000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, SUM(total_budget) AS total_budget FROM budgets JOIN projects ON budgets.project_id = projects.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT users.username, SUM(total_expenses) AS total_expenses FROM cost_analysis JOIN users ON cost_analysis.project_id = users.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT project_name, expense_category, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
